items.title: CES 2025 preview: What to expect at tech’s biggest show | The DeanBeat
items.description: Next week at the CES 2025 trade show in Las Vegas, we'll once again be able to see and hear about the latest tech trends in person.

items.title: How Meta’s latest research proves you can use generative AI to understand user intent
items.description: By thinking about recommendation as a generative problem, you can tackle it from new angles and use LLMs to better understand user intent.

items.title: Swave Photonics raises $28.3M for 3D holographic smartglasses and displays
items.description: Swave Photonics, a holographic display company, has raised $28.27 million in funding as it prepares components for AI-powered smart glasses.

items.title: Inside the AI agent revolution: How data-driven automation transformed the enterprise in 2024
items.description: In a recent survey, 82% of tech executives said they intend to integrate AI agents across their stacks within the next three years.

items.title: Why 2025 will redefine data infrastructure: 11 expert insights on sovereign clouds, exploding data, PaaS and more
items.description: Key predictions from data infrastructure industry experts and vendors to help enterprises tap the AI opportunity for growth in 2025.
